carpet.rule.enableTickStepCounter.name: Tick Step Counter
carpet.rule.enableTickStepCounter.desc: Counts how many ticks have been step after last freeze.
TickStepCounter.stepped: This is the %s tick after /tick freeze.
carpet.rule.enableMountPlayers.name: Bypass Mount Player Restriction.
carpet.rule.enableMountPlayers.desc: Allow entity to mount player entities.
carpet.rule.allowUnsignedMessages.name: Allow Unsigned Messages
carpet.rule.allowUnsignedMessages.desc: Allow unsigned messages from offline players
carpet.rule.stopTickingWorldBorder.name: Stop Ticking World Border
carpet.rule.stopTickingWorldBorder.desc: Prevents the world border from updating its state each tick
carpet.rule.stopTickingWeather.name: Stop Ticking Weather
carpet.rule.stopTickingWeather.desc: Disables weather updates, such as rain or thunderstorms
carpet.rule.stopTickingTime.name: Stop Ticking Time
carpet.rule.stopTickingTime.desc: Halts the progression of the in-game time of day
carpet.rule.stopTickingBlocks.name: Stop Ticking Blocks
carpet.rule.stopTickingBlocks.desc: Prevents scheduled or random block ticks, such as crop growth or repeaters
carpet.rule.stopTickingFluids.name: Stop Ticking Fluids
carpet.rule.stopTickingFluids.desc: Stops fluid updates, like water or lava flow
carpet.rule.stopTickingRaid.name: Stop Ticking Raids
carpet.rule.stopTickingRaid.desc: Disables raid event updates and progression
carpet.rule.stopTickingChunkManager.name: Stop Ticking Chunk Manager
carpet.rule.stopTickingChunkManager.desc: Prevents the chunk manager from processing chunk loading and unloading
carpet.rule.stopTickingBlockEvents.name: Stop Ticking Block Events
carpet.rule.stopTickingBlockEvents.desc: Halts processing of queued block events, such as pistons
carpet.rule.stopTickingDragonFight.name: Stop Ticking Dragon Fight
carpet.rule.stopTickingDragonFight.desc: Freezes the ender dragon fight mechanics in the End dimension
carpet.rule.stopCheckEntityDespawn.name: Stop Checking Entity Despawn
carpet.rule.stopCheckEntityDespawn.desc: Disables despawn checks for entities, preventing them from despairing
carpet.rule.stopTickingEntities.name: Stop Ticking Entities
carpet.rule.stopTickingEntities.desc: Prevents entities, like mobs or players, from ticking
carpet.rule.stopTickingBlockEntities.des: Stops block entities, such as furnaces or chests, from ticking
carpet.rule.stopTickingSpawners.name: Stop Ticking Spawners
carpet.rule.enchantCommandLimitOverwrite: Set level limit of /enchant command to 255
carpet.rule.enchantCommandBypassItemType: Bypass item type restriction for /enchant command
carpet.rule.mergeSmartAndRegularCommandS: Merge Smart And Regular Command Suggestions
Carpet only shows smart suggestions while regular suggestions list is empty. This rule merges them into one list.
